title: Whole Foods supplier UNFI restores core systems after cyberattack
summary: American grocery wholesale giant United Natural Foods (UNFI) reports that it has restored its core systems and brought online the electronic ordering and invoicing systems affected by a cyberattack. [...]

title: Hawaiian Airlines discloses cyberattack, flights not affected
summary: Hawaiian Airlines, the tenth-largest commercial airline in the United States, is investigating a cyberattack that has disrupted access to some of its systems. [...]

title: FTC approves $126 million in Fortnite refunds over ‘dark patterns’
summary: The Federal Trade Commission (FTC) has approved $126,000,000 in refunds to be sent to 969,173 Fortnite players as part of a settlement over allegations that Epic Games tricked users into making unwanted purchases. [...]
